abstract: The automaker said that only models equipped with turbocharged V-8 and V-12 engines were affected by the recall.
snippet: The automaker said that only models equipped with turbocharged V-8 and V-12 engines were affected by the recall.
lead_paragraph: BMW is recalling 32,000 of its most powerful vehicles because of a fire hazard, the automaker has informed the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration.

headline.main: BMW Recalls 32,000 High-Horsepower Models for Fire Hazard
